title: New: James Ferraro – Blood Flow
body:
**James Ferraro** isn’t an artist I’ve spent enough time with, despite his new Mixtape, _Cold_, due out via **Hippos in Tank** later this month.

The first drop, _Blood Flow_, is a dreary, highly percussive, scattered track, with breaks and snares treated as drops of ink, dripping amongst the track with a playful energy. There’s a sinister element to the piece that also resonates perfectly, the vocals almost sound like a sustained and obsessive humming session, words aren’t as powerful as sounds.

Cold is due out on March 25. grab it **[her](http://www.coldmixtape.com/)e** on the day.
